The example in the video focuses on classifying objects in grayscale photos, but CNNs can also handle color. However, computers "see" color differently than humans.

## Understanding How Computers See Color

Computers do not prize the beauty of a painting or the wonder of an emotionally stirring photograph. Instead, they understand these images through numbers.
